pullrequest.title: Added multicamera sensor to support synchronized stereo cameras

content.raw: I feel like this `* 3` math is assuming 3 bytes per pixel, which won't be true for all formats.  If that's the case, then either the math should depend on the format or (more likely) we should assert that the image format is one that we know how to serialize.
content.html: I feel like this * 3 math is assuming 3 bytes per pixel, which won't be true for all formats. If that's the case, then either the math should depend on the format or (more likely) we should assert that the image format is one that we know how to serialize.
